QuestData.Title: Emergency Supplies
QuestData.Description: Rifling through the dead gnome's possessions, you come across a small packet filled with rations, tools, and a handy roll of gnomish duct tape. The contents of these kits might prove helpful to Fezzix Geartwist when it comes time for him to reassemble the wreckage of the gnomish flying machines.$B$BBringing a few of these kits to Fezzix might just be worth a nice bonus.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 7 Gnomish Emergency Toolkits from the bodies of crashed Fizzcrank Recon Pilots and bring them to Fezzix Geartwist at Taunka'le Village.
QuestData.CompletionText: What is it you have there?
QuestData.RewardText: Gnomish tools? For me? These should make rebuilding that flying machine even easier than I expected.
